data.title: Solar Turbines Slovakia
data.meta_description: We are one of the worldâ€™s leading manufacturers of industrial gas turbines. Our porfolio includes more than 16,000 successful installations of Solar units in over 100 countries in the world, and available service.
data.text:
Solar Turbines is a global leader in providing energy solutions and takes a great pride in calling Slovakia its home since 2021.

Solar Turbines Slovakia mainly focuses on providing and supporting digital solutions in the areas of software product development, data acquisition, machine learning, cybersecurity, user & customer experience, analytics and innovation of the entire ecosystem.

The Solar Digital ecosystem brings extensive and complex technological end-to-end solutions. They are purposefully created from the point of data acquisitions to the user interface, using streams of raw and transformed data in real time.

Digital solutions are designed in such a way that they provide customers information about machines, proactive analysis and tools for managing operational risks - from secure data architecture to custom mobile interfaces.

Find out how Solar Digital Solutions can bring you success and join our team.
